name: Experiment Island
description:
This island was once used for genetic experimentation. Now the military uses it to test their robotics on the violent mutations.

Be careful out there, the other hunters  are not so friendly.

***Unfortunately my game is to big to upload here, if you are interested in giving it a try it is included in a google drive link***

Developer Comments: Team of one. Time constraints made it impossible for me to do more with the sound and music , you might need to turn it down. The quit game button does not work I am sorry! Also it appears the caves are partly invisible in this build.

Other than that I am extremely happy with what I accomplished in the 15 or so days I had to work on this.

Assets used

For terrain- GaiaPro, Gena, Underworld Cave Enviroment, Meadow    Enviroment:Nature Manufacturer, and Kripto HDRP Water.

Characters- Necromancer and Martyr: Maksim Burgimov

Monster- Letalobrach:Protofactor

Music- Complete Music Pack

Controller/AI- Ultimate Character Controller and Behavior Designer:Opsive
